title: Remake is gone?
body:
ezreal never connected, no remake option at 3:00

freelo for the other team.

replies.body: [**Remakes **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686)have a few different requirements that need to be met before it activates. Someone might not have been flagged as inactive, or someone may not have initiated the vote to start it. If you think it bugged out, hit up our game agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can look into it!
